snippet: The owner of South Street Seaport wants to overhaul Pier 17, the giant shopping pavilion that anchors the seaport, and turn it into something that will attract New Yorkers and not just tourists.
abstract: The owner of South Street Seaport wants to overhaul Pier 17, the giant shopping pavilion that anchors the seaport, and turn it into something that will attract New Yorkers and not just tourists.

headline.print_headline: New Vision for Pier 17, With Profits in Mind
